enum.name: PLANE_MODE
enum.description: A mapping of the additional plane flight modes for custom_mode field of heartbeat.

enum.name: AI_EVENT_TYPE
enum.description: These values define the type of AI events that could occur during the test evaluation.

entry.name: AI_NEW_TEST_EVALUATION
entry.description: Denotes the start of a new test evaluation event.

entry.name: AI_ROUTING_TO_INIITIALIZATION
entry.description: Beginning of routing of the aircraft to the designated initial test conditions.

entry.name: AI_ENABLED_CONTROL
entry.description: Entering the phase in which the AI agent has complete control authority of the aircraft.

entry.name: AI_ABORTED_TEST
entry.description: An event or situation had occured causing the test to be aborted.

entry.name: AI_CEASING_TEST_EVALUATION
entry.description: Testing conducted under the coordinating AI_NEW_TEST_EVALUATION tag is stopping.

message.name: SET_SURFACE_DEFLECTION_NORMALIZED
message.description: Sets the deflection of the control surfaces of the aircraft. Principally used with fixed wing.
message.field: Bitmask defining the control authorities on the axis that should remain stabilized or tracking an explicit condition. This would imply we can set the aircraft on a course or attitude state that is maintained by an inner-loop control law while evaluating the other axes under AI control.
Normalized x-axis value between -1 and 1 that corresponds to the elevators of the vehicle.
Normalized y-axis value between -1 and 1 that corresponds to the ailerons of the vehicle.
Normalized r-axis value between -1 and 1 that corresponds to the rudders of the vehicle.
Collective thrust, normalized to 0 .. 1 (-1 .. 1 for vehicles capable of reverse trust)
